What are people asking?
What is a Loan on Card facility?
The (LOC) facility allows you to convert a portion of your available Credit Card limit into cash. The amount is transferred directly to your bank account or issued as a manager’s cheque.
Who can apply for a Loan on Card?
This facility is available for primary Emirates NBD credit cardholders, based on your eligibility and available credit limit.
What is the maximum amount I can borrow as a Loan on Card?
You can borrow up to 90% of your available Credit Card limit, depending on your eligibility and available credit limit.

How long will it take to process a Loan on Card?
Your Loan on Card will be processed instantly and reflected on your account and Credit Card statement.
Can supplementary cardholders apply for a Loan on Card?
No, the Loan on Card facility is available only for primary cardholders.

Fees for Loan on Card are determined by Emirates NBD and will be charged on the plan. Fees are subject to change. Please
click here
for more information.
Can I earn reward points on the Loan on Card?
No, currently there are no reward points associated with the Loan on Card facility.

metadata.title: Instant Cash Loan on Card Within Credit Limit | Emirates NBD

content:
Will my available credit limit increase as I pay off my Loan on Card?
Yes, as you repay the Loan on Card, your available Credit Card limit will increase.
How is the monthly EMI calculated?
Your monthly EMI will be the sum of the principal amount, interest for the selected tenure, and any applicable processing fee (included only in the first EMI).
Can I cancel my existing Loan on Card?
Yes, you can prepay or foreclose your Loan on Card by calling us on
600 54 0000
(UAE)  or
+971 600 54 0000
internationally.
A foreclosure fee of 1% of the principal outstanding plus 5% VAT will apply.
What happens if I prepay my Loan on Card?
Even if you prepay, your Loan on Card will remain active until you cancel the plan by calling us on
600 54 0000
(UAE) or
+971 600 54 0000
internationally. A 1% foreclosure fee plus 5% VAT will be charged on the principal outstanding.
What happens if I miss payments on my Loan on Card?

What happens if I miss payments on my Loan on Card?
If you miss payments for two consecutive months, your plan will automatically be foreclosed. The full outstanding balance including a foreclosure fee will be due, and regular finance charges will apply.
What happens if I close my Credit Card while I have a Loan on Card?
Active Loan on Card plans must be foreclosed first and then your credit card cancellation request can be processed. Foreclosure fees will apply.
